nodes.text: Star Wars: The Complete Saga is a children's storybook written by Jason Fry and published by Scholastic Inc. on September 1, 2011. It tells the story of the first six films of the Star Wars saga, from the prequel trilogy through the original trilogy, using stills taken directly from the movies.
The book was reissued in August 2015 under the Disney brand with the new title Star Wars: Episodes I–VI, in accommodation of the then-upcoming Star Wars sequel trilogy.
